description: So we’ve been teased with security cam flashes of politician Alex Mecum during an ‘indiscretion’ which he tried to cover up. In ‘Full Disclosure’ Alex confronted his head of security Massimo Piano over the sensitive footage but we were left asking what actually happened on the night of the campaign dinner event. So seize this chance to enjoy the full event captured on CCTV cameras as smooth American Mecum uses his position of influence and power to win overbuilt, dark Spaniard Gabriel Lunna, who he finds clearing up the final glasses at the end of his waiting shift. When Alex realizes the worker doesn’t understand a word he’s saying he plays on the ‘lost in translation’ opportunity and toys with Gabriel like a cat playing with a mouse. And yet once the game begins it’s the powerful Alex that loves to be subservient and dominated, prostrating himself at Gabriel’s feet and worshiping his shoes. That’s not to say Gabriel doesn’t get a good hard fucking from Mecum’s huge rod of a cock before he flips Alex and gives him a piece of his own medicine. Our so sophisticated politician is butt naked and biting down on sofa cushions while being fucked by his Hispanic waiting staff, and all caught on camera!
title: UNDISCLOSED: Alex Mecum & Gabriel Lunna
